H0.text: TV host Cat Deeley married which comedian in 2012. John Bishop

H1.text: TV host Cat Deeley married which comedian in 2012. Ricky Gervais

H2.text: TV host Cat Deeley married which comedian in 2012. Stephen Fry

H3.text: TV host Cat Deeley married which comedian in 2012. PK Tonight

A4.text: Deeley married Northern Irish comedian and television presenter Patrick Kielty on 30 September 2012 in Rome.
